Am’s code

Here are a few projects to start with. More to follow …

  • goxc is a build tool for Go, focussing on cross-compiling & packaging Go programs.
  • ChordialJS is a pre-alpha javascript library for building guitar chords and progressions.
  • mkdo is a command-line utility to make appropriate directories before running a given command.
  • nettis is an integration testing utility for network apps.
